abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid33009893, pmid33037066, pmid32977728, pmid33031477, pmid32978702, pmid33025529, pmid33010111, pmid33021025
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.10.14
